titleStmt.title: Abrahams sute for Sodome a sermon preached at Pauls Cr[o]sse the 25 of August, 1611 / by Robert Milles, preacher of Gedny fenne, and Sutton St. Edmonds in Holland Lincolneshire.
titleStmt.author: Milles, Robert.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Hall for Mathew Lawe and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church yard at the signe of the Foxe,

notesStmt.note: Signatures: A⁸(-A1) B-F⁸ G⁸ (last leaf blank).
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University. Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Pauls Church yard at the signe of the Foxe
